Quick start (easy mode):
â€¢ Type a message to chat with the AI
â€¢ /go <task> - OKR+PRD gated relay (requires approval, tracks outcomes)
â€¢ /autochat <task> - PRD-gated relay by default (use --no-prd for tactical)
â€¢ /autochat-local <task> - PRD-gated local relay (use --no-prd for tactical)
â€¢ /local - switch active model to local CUDA
â€¢ /file - open file picker and attach file content to your next message
â€¢ /add <name> - create a helper teammate
â€¢ /talk <name> <message> - message a teammate
â€¢ /list - show teammates
â€¢ /remove <name> - remove teammate
â€¢ /home - return to main chat
â€¢ /help - open help
â€¢ CLI autonomy: codetether forage --top 5
